title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node instead.

Expected Behavior: The selected item in the library outline view should remain focused and selectable.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: The selected item in the library outline view should remain focused and selectable.
SR:
1. Add a label to a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
